title: What are some interesting and off-beat topics to write articles on? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi, Some interesting topics you can write on are, Fashion or Beauty related articlesHow smartphones affects a student’s life (Good and Bad in both ways)Encouraging articles like, Follow your dreamsCase studies of Business tycoonsUpcoming Technology changes like, Automation In Information Technology industry.

Ahh..... Not to be selfish.... But this is a good topic: How would have life been if the human head had a USB port? P. S: A little past experience as a editor-in-chief for my college magazine, let me tell you, getting people to read a book is a damn hard task. Read as in the words. Good luck.
